data.name: Mountain Taxi Driver
data.detailed_description:
Are you ready for a thrilling drive as an adventurous Taxi Driver in Mountain Taxi Driver?!

Taxi driving gets more exciting and adventurous with this brand new game. Act as Taxi driver, find and pick up the passengers and drive through the dangerous and steep hill road terrains and drop the passenger safely at the destinations on time.

Drive at high speeds and don’t let curvy pathways and broken roads to slow you down. Watch out while driving as these mountains and hill terrains have very dangerous rocks around!!!

Game Features:
- Time limit
- Use your hill driving skills, complete each mission and unlock the other levels.
- Drive carefully without hitting any obstacles and drop the passenger safely at destinations.

data.short_description: Taxi driving gets more exciting and adventurous with this brand new game. Act as Taxi driver, find and pick up the passengers and drive through the dangerous and steep hill road terrains and drop the passenger safely at the destinations on time.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP x64
  • Processor: Intel Celeron
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 730
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
